byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: Miller Buckfire has hired John McKenna, a senior restructuring banker at Houlihan Lokey, as it deepens a strategic alliance with Stifel Financial.
snippet: Miller Buckfire has hired John McKenna, a senior restructuring banker at Houlihan Lokey, as it deepens a strategic alliance with Stifel Financial.
lead_paragraph: Miller Buckfire, the boutique investment bank, said on Wednesday that it had hired John McKenna, who was most recently the co-head of Houlihan Lokey's eastern region financial restructuring team. The hiring follows a string of departures at Miller Buckfire as it enters into an alliance with Stifel Financial. Read more »

headline.main: Miller Buckfire Hires a Senior Houlihan Executive
